name: 廖天豪
objective:
複數，可分析函數，基本複數函數，複數積分，數列，餘數與極點，函數之映射，保角映射，複數函數應用。
1.Complex Numbers

2.Complex Functions

3.Harmonic Functions

4.Complex Integration

5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 

6.Complex Power Series

7.Laurent Series,Residues

8.Conformal Mapping
schedule:
Week 1 Complex Numbers and Their Geometric Representation & Polar Form of Complex Numbers. Powers and Roots
Week 2 Derivative. Analytic Function & Cauchy–Riemann Equations. Laplace’s Equation
Week 3 Exponential Function & Trigonometric and Hyperbolic Functions. Euler’ s Formula
Week 4 Logarithm. General Power. Principal Value & Line Integral in the Complex Plane
Week 5 Cauchy’ s Integral Theorem & Cauchy’ s Integral Formula
Week 6 Derivatives of Analytic Functions & Sequences, Series, Convergence Tests
Week 7 Power Series & Functions Given by Power Series
Week 8 Taylor and Maclaurin Series & Uniform Convergence. Optional
Week 9 Mid-term
Week 10 Laurent Series & Singularities and Zeros. Infinity
Week 11 Residue Integration Method & Residue Integration of Real Integrals
Week 12 Geometry of Analytic Functions: Conformal Mapping & Linear Fractional Transformations (Möbius Transformations)
Week 13 Special Linear Fractional Transformations & Conformal Mapping by Other Functions
Week 14 Riemann Surfaces. Optional & Electrostatic Fields
Week 15 Use of Conformal Mapping. Modeling & Heat Problems
Week 16 Fluid Flow & Poisson’ s Integral Formula for Potentials
Week 17 General Properties of Harmonic Functions. Uniqueness Theorem for the Dirichlet Problem
Week 18 Final
materials: E. Kreyszig, H. Kreyszig, and E. J. Norminton, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Tenth. Hoboken, NJ: Wiley, 2011.
